name: REST API Load Test Example
description: Production-ready configuration for testing a REST API application

config.testGoal: Simulate realistic e-commerce user journeys including browsing products, adding to cart, and completing purchases

recommendations.agentScaling: Start with 10-20 agents, scale up to 100+ for stress testing
recommendations.testDuration: Run for 10-30 minutes for meaningful results
recommendations.monitoring: Focus on API response times, error rates, and database performance
recommendations.endpoints: Include both read-heavy (product browsing) and write-heavy (order creation) operations
